attributes.action: Stop the government apointed inspectors from having the right to access private property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the new government inspectors having the right to enter private property to assess it's value for the new community charge. This is against the most basic human rights of the public. Even the police require good reason and a search warrant to gain entry. With such capabilities, these inspectors will be above the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
